channel.title: Help with underclocking 670 FTW
channel.description: So apparently GPU overclocks could be causing the issues I'm having with Metro LL and I want to try and revert the factory overclock I have on my card with a separate PrecisionX profile to see if it helps. I have no idea what I'm doing though. Looking the card up gives me a bunch of clock rates but I have no idea how to go about changing values in PrecisionX to underclock it. If someone could help me with this I would appreciate it a lot.

item.title: Help with underclocking 670 FTW
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
So apparently GPU overclocks could be causing the issues I’m having with Metro LL and I want to try and revert the factory overclock I have on my card with a separate PrecisionX profile to see if it helps. I have no idea what I’m doing though. Looking the card up gives me a bunch of clock rates but I have no idea how to go about changing values in PrecisionX to underclock it. If someone could help me with this I would appreciate it a lot.

Read full topic
